algorithm.maze

类 SimpleQLearning

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithm.maze.Maze
      • algorithm.maze.SimpleQLearning
  • 直接已知子类:
    ControlledRandomQLearning

    public class SimpleQLearning
extends Maze
    The basic Q-learning algorithm.
    Project: Reinforce learning.
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Fan Min
    www.fansmale.com, github.com/fansmale/MFAdaBoosting.
    Email: minfan@swpu.edu.cn, minfanphd@163.com.
    Date Created: August 16, 2020.
    Last modified: August 16, 2020.
